review.summary: Clean and well-structured __init__.py file for action domain entities module. Follows neo-commons platform conventions with comprehensive __all__ list for explicit public API control. Properly exports Action, ActionStatus, ActionExecution, and EventActionSubscription entities with clear import organization.

positive_observations.observation: Perfect adherence to neo-commons __all__ pattern for explicit public API control
Clean and organized relative imports following feature-first architecture
Comprehensive entity exports covering all core action domain entities
Follows single responsibility principle - solely focused on entity exports
Consistent with project-wide import and module organization patterns

context.tests: No specific tests needed for __init__.py file - entities have their own test coverage
context.documentation: Google-style docstring present describing module purpose
context.configuration: No configuration required for this module export file
